Articles.Content:
![YegyBTi.png](http://i.imgur.com/YegyBTi.png)

Yes, I am a hyoo-mahn. Why do you ask?

*That's not a Russian accent.*

What do you mean, I am totally from the United States of Australia.

*You mean America?*

Yeah, sure. One of those things.

*But you're Russian.*

Oh right, yes, ov course. I vill keep this in the mind.

*Something's weird with you today Valentina.*

I swear it is a real nose!

*What?*

*That's actually Valentina Tershkova's nose. I copied Valentina Tereshkova's nose onto Valentina Kerman's face. It helps with the immersion in Real Solar System.*

- - - Updated - - -

![JlaF6M5.png](http://i.imgur.com/JlaF6M5.png)

Or Mr. Armstrong. 

*Well, his nose anyway.*

> That's actually Valentina Tershkova's nose. I copied Valentina Tereshkova's nose onto Valentina Kerman's face. It helps with the immersion in Real Solar System.

Yes! Absolutely immersive! If you hadn't cleared that up, I never would have guessed. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):sticktongue:![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Well that didn't make me pee my pants...
Next mission: ISRU mining in the Uncanny Valley...

> 
> That's terrifying ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Yes. Yes it is.
What did I just read... and see?
What an ugly growth you have on your face, Ms. Kerman. ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

> 
> What an ugly growth you have on your face, Ms. Kerman. ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

":( You're an ugly growth on my face."

Now Valentina that is just uncalled for.
Putting noses on Kerbals will make things better and not worse.

> 
> Putting noses on Kerbals will make things better and not worse.

Finally someone gets it.
